statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount from payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND transaction_type = 'refund' ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id IN (1002, 1005, 1007) AND transaction_type LIKE 'payment%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 7
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE compliance_status='pending';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp, payer_account_id, payee_account_id FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, log_message FROM payment_logs;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM payment_transactions WHERE compliance_status = 'approved' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT payer_account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payer_account_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_transactions, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE compliance_status = 'approved';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_status FROM compliance_reviews WHERE review_status = 'pending';
SELECT transaction_id, log_details FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_details LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method IN ('credit card', 'paypal') ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs JOIN payment_transactions ON transaction_logs.transaction_id = payment_transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT review_id, review_status, review_comments FROM compliance_reviews WHERE review_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT payment_method, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY payment_method;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, is_compliant, checked_by FROM compliance_checks WHERE is_compliant = true;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_accounts.username, payment_transactions.amount FROM user_accounts JOIN payment_transactions ON user_accounts.user_id = payment_transactions.user_id;

SELECT audit_logs.log_message, payment_transactions.amount FROM audit_logs JOIN payment_transactions ON audit_logs.transaction_id = payment_transactions.transaction_id WHERE payment_transactions.amount < 500;

SELECT user_accounts.username, compliance_checks.is_compliant FROM user_accounts JOIN compliance_checks ON user_accounts.user_id = compliance_checks.transaction_id WHERE compliance_checks.is_compliant = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE status='completed';
SELECT payer_id, payee_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_text FROM security_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT users.username, payment_transactions.amount FROM users JOIN payment_transactions ON users.user_id = payment_transactions.payer_id WHERE users.role = 'admin';
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE status IN ('pending','failed') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT payment_logs.timestamp, payment_logs.log_text, payment_transactions.amount FROM payment_logs JOIN payment_transactions ON payment_logs.transaction_id = payment_transactions.transaction_id WHERE payment_transactions.amount < 500;
